First example of row editor

This version of the Editor allows you to add, edit and remove rows by activating an edition mode.

All operations are carried out directly in a row.

For more explain see our documentation about editor.

Delete

Are you sure to delete selected rows?

Extended columns - Row Editor

With our Table Editor plugin you can easily have more/less column in Table Row Editor than default example (6). Only what you have to do this:

  • Add new (or delete old one) th in thead.
  • Add new (or delete old one) td to each tr in tbody.

Seven columns

Delete

Are you sure to delete selected rows?
